name: Starboard Demo 0.0.2
description:
Press F to collect items from crates. E to open inventory. Select the hammer in the hotbar and hold Q to select a building to place.

To save your buildings, press O.

To load your save file, press L. This will delete all current buildings.

Let me know of any bugs on discord! https://discord.gg/tp8hmkj

Subreddit: https://reddit.com/r/starboard

Follow me on Twitter: @kodiakwhale
